column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I had never had tapas before coming here
column2: but I had always heard how great their food was so I gave it a try.  There are so many choices on the menu
column3: and you could definitely feel lost if you were a newbie if the waiters didn't lead you in the right direction.  They offer 'safe' suggestions on what most people like.  If you decide you like something
column4: your server will offer choices based on that.
